WavesTravelThrough.Description: One student makes a small wave, another a large wave on opposite ends.

MultipleChoice.a: the waves pass through each other
MultipleChoice.b: the waves bounce off each other

TensionAndSpeed.Description: Students increase tension of the slinky by pulling more of the spring in at around 20 ft, and comparing th taut spring to the loose spring.

MultipleChoice.a: A looser slinky, the waves travel slower
MultipleChoice.b: A looser slinky, the waves travel faster
